ai-ps1.9:1.1_0: Of all the path to face, thinking,
ai-ps1.9:1.2_0: Remembering this path, he has wrong view, the path for giving up wrong view, and the causes and conditions for the corruption of mind. It is both the path and the practice that leads to the cessation of the mind.
ai-ps1.9:2.1_0: The path is born. It is for giving up wrong thought and embracing thoughts. It is the path for the sake of thought that leads to giving up the prison, and the causes and conditions are caused by the mind. Relying on the path for the sake of the mind, both for the sake of the sake of the discrimination and the path. for the sake of the cause, and the reason for the cessation of the mind.
ai-ps1.9:3.1_0: The noble path is presume for giving up wrong speech, and the path for the sake of investigating, and for the sake of thoughts. The path is discovered, and the path for the sake of the mind. both. The path and the practice that leads to the cessation of the mind.
ai-ps1.9:4.1_0: The path is prejudiced with right action, for giving up wrong action and embracing the path. It is both the causes and conditions for the mind. And both the path and the practice that leads to the cessation of the mind.
ai-ps1.9:5.4_0: The path and immersion for giving up wrong immersion. It is prejudiced for things that have arisen in me. The path is both reborn and the practice causes and conditions for the cessation of the mind. And both causes and the path to understand the causes and conditions for the reason.
ai-ps1.9:6.2_0: The path has arisen in an a solid nectar with sensual desire, the result of past deeds, and the path for giving up of the mental processes. It depends on the path and preces, and the path to the end of the mind. And both for the sake of sensual pleasures that which leads to giving up the cause, and the path to dispelling path.
ai-ps1.9:7.2_0: The path for giving up sensual desire, perseverance, a path for the mental development of sensual desire, for the understanding of the mental processes, and the path to occupy the mind. both formerly and the path and there are causes and reasons for the practice that leads to the cessation of sensual pleasures. Knowing and the path to the causes and conditions for the reason.
ai-ps1.9:8.2_0: The path and practice for giving up desire and greed for the form of the formless realm. Contact is a path leading to peace. It is also a cause of ignorance. When ignorance fades away and ceases. And it causes and conditions for the causes.’
ai-ps1.9:9.1_0: the sight of right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-ps1.9:9.2_0: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
ai-ps1.9:10.1_0: And the power of faith, the power of faith, the power of faith, the power of energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ps1.9:10.2_0: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ps1.9:11.1_0: The path for realizing the deathless, the road, the ear, the nose, the tongue, the body, the spiritual path, the disconcile of the teachings, the eight parts, the text on monastic training, the path, the purification of ethics, immersion, wisdom, and the path to freedom.
ai-ps1.9:11.2_0: The Viety of the Path is finished.
